title: Tangled Minds
description: Choices...Actions...Consequences...its called Life. Bob and Joan Van Pelt.loving parents, wanting only the best for their only daughter. With all their strength, they attempt to cease the ill actions and black consequences of their daughter's irresponsible choices. Their hope is stripped.their love discarded, as they watch their daughter destroy not only herself, but all those around her. Brianna Van Pelt.17 years old girl trapped within the consequences of her own design. Unable to grasp the reality of her own responsibilities, her choices of behavior and her subsequent actions she is lost in her immaturity. She is bound within chains of anger and hatred toward all around her, especially the physical incarnation of her bad decisions, her son, Joshua. Ken Morgan.tall, dark and handsome is well mannered and articulate. He is extremely well to do financially and blessed with intelligence and proficient in the art of manipulation. Showing us just how suave, endearing, and malicious the evil in this world can be.
author: Yvonne Mason
